column4: Does anybody know if Ubuntu will follow any of the things listed in "The Linux Distribution Of The Future"?
Does anybody know if Ubuntu will follow any of the things listed in "The Linux Distribution Of The Future"? http://akaimbatman.blogspot.com/2005/06/linux-desktop-distribution-of-future_15.html
#2 is the only one I see Ubuntu (possibly) having issues with, but that's more of a "making the user understand the layout"
even #2 might not matter...most (normal users) people just want it to work, and they ask for help, we walk them through it step-by-step (or have how-tos/tutorials ready to go)
